body_content.explanation: any of the separate parts into which a book or other piece of text is divided, usually given a number or title:
a period that is part of a larger amount of time during which something happens:
examples: The period before the revolution is an interesting chapter in British history.
That chapter of my life closed when I had a serious riding accident.

body_content.explanation: a group of people that is in charge of a religious community:
examples: He persuaded the cathedral chapter to let the college use the room for worship.
This title was given to an ecclesiastical official who was head of a chapter of canons in a cathedral.

body_content.explanation: a local group that is part of a larger organization:
examples: The local chapter of the League of Women Voters meets at the library.
